name: BeJUULed
description:
To play simply click and drag over as many of the same JUUL as you can.

Dear potential employers,

I wanted to try my hand at making an HTML5 game, so I decided to make this. This game is to serve as a warning to those who vape. Vaping is extremely toxic and dangerous.

This is simply a parody/reskin of Bejeweled to make my friends laugh. Please enjoy.

Best Wishes,

Weston
